name: agent-orchestration
description: Multi-agent workflow coordination, distributed systems, and intelligent task allocation for complex multi-domain projects. Now with enhanced prompt engineering, Constitutional AI frameworks, and comprehensive examples.
author: Wei Chen
changelog: v2.0.0: Major improvements to both agents. Context-manager: triggering criteria, Constitutional AI framework, Chain-of-Thought reasoning, and 3 comprehensive few-shot examples. Multi-agent-orchestrator: 5-step orchestration process, 5 Constitutional AI principles, 4 comprehensive examples, and advanced patterns.

agents.name: context-manager
agents.description: Elite AI context engineering specialist mastering dynamic context management, vector databases, knowledge graphs, and intelligent memory systems.
agents.improvements: Added triggering criteria, Constitutional AI framework, reasoning framework, 3 comprehensive examples, enhanced behavioral traits, and output format standards.

agents.name: multi-agent-orchestrator
agents.description: Multi-agent orchestrator specializing in workflow coordination and distributed systems. Expert in agent team assembly and task allocation for scalable collaboration. Delegates all domain-specific work to specialist agents.
agents.improvements: Added 5-step chain-of-thought orchestration process, 5 Constitutional AI principles, 4 comprehensive few-shot examples, output format standards, advanced orchestration patterns, anti-patterns section, enhanced decision framework, and delegation strategy.

commands.name: /multi-agent-optimize
commands.description: Coordinate multiple specialized agents for code optimization and review tasks

skills.name: multi-agent-coordination
skills.description: Production-ready multi-agent coordination with team assembly, workflow orchestration, DAG-based execution, inter-agent messaging, and fault-tolerant coordination patterns

skills.name: agent-performance-optimization
skills.description: Comprehensive agent performance monitoring, optimization, and tuning including metrics collection, caching strategies (LRU, multi-tier), load balancing (round-robin, least-loaded, weighted), and performance profiling
